title: Cozy detached single family home - A+ location
app_fee: $35 - application fee, includes credit report, background check, rental history
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
If you want your own place and don't want to hear your neighbors, this freshly updated 1 bedroom 1 bath single family home is perfect for you!!
Walkable to downtown Westmont and shopping at Cass and Ogden Ave.
Large yard with shed for toys and lawn equipment.
Full unfinished basement that includes a washer, dryer, and utility sink.
Updates include all fresh paint throughout, new blinds, and new carpet.
The house has good insulation and newer windows to keep the gas bill in check.
If you do not want to maintain the yard, lawn service can be provided for an additional $140/mo.
No utilities are included in rent.
